package.name: triskar_joystick
package.description:
The triskar_joystick package. It is supposed to listen to a PS3 like joystick and publish twist messages for controlling the triskar robot base. Those messages have linear and angular velocities informations.
The analog axis: LEFT: Linear velocity (x-y plane) RIGTH: Rotation:
Buttons: 6: allows commands to be transmited. If not pressed, no commands are going to be published by the subscriber ros node (robogame_joystick). 8: allows automatic rotation (player following on the z-axis). 4: increases current linear velocity by 5%. (Change happens on the proportional linear gain) 3: decreases current linear velocity by 5%. (Change happens on the proportional linear gain) 1: increases current angular velocity by 5%. (Change happens on the proportional angular gain) 2: decreases current angular velocity by 5%. (Change happens on the proportional angular gain) mode: allows linear comand on the cross axis instead of analog LEFT.
